question.title: Getting used memory on Redis instance using Redis Enterprise REST API
question.body:
In my firm, we have Redis clusters and use the APIs from this page for various metadata purpose. For example, this is used to get the memory limit on a Redis instance as well as supported module information. https://redis.io/docs/latest/operate/rs/references/rest-api/requests/bdbs/

Now as part of some enhancement, I need to write a logic so that if used memory breaches a particular threshold from the memory limit then some kind of eviction mechanism or some custom code needs to be invoked.

I am going through the above link but not getting a clear way to get the used memory at a given time. Does anyone have an idea as to what may be a good approach?
